name: aops-core
description: AcademicOps Core Framework Extension for Gemini CLI

hooks.SessionStart: uv run --directory ${AOPS} python aops-core/hooks/router.py --client gemini SessionStart
hooks.BeforeAgent: uv run --directory ${AOPS} python aops-core/hooks/router.py --client gemini BeforeAgent
hooks.BeforeTool: uv run --directory ${AOPS} python aops-core/hooks/router.py --client gemini BeforeTool
hooks.AfterTool: uv run --directory ${AOPS} python aops-core/hooks/router.py --client gemini AfterTool
hooks.AfterAgent: uv run --directory ${AOPS} python aops-core/hooks/router.py --client gemini AfterAgent
hooks.SessionEnd: uv run --directory ${AOPS} python aops-core/hooks/router.py --client gemini SessionEnd
